Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource.serialization

Class ObjectSerializerRegistry

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.resource.serialization.ObjectSerializerRegistry
public class ObjectSerializerRegistry extends Object
A map from Extension to ObjectSerializer. By default, serializers are available for .properties and .json files.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
